description: navy and brown striped robe with navy blue applique trim on sleeve cuffs, bottom half of body, yoke, and back center, all with lighter blue, curving embroidery patterns, including some small heart shapes along lower section; solid blue interior lining

title: Chikarkarpe robe with heart-shaped embroidery
